title: Entrepreneurial Idea Generation Strategies Using Scientific Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic entrepreneurship processes and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners explore applying scientific problem-solving methods to startup idea development, with emphasis on functional diversity importance and exploratory learning mindset formation

learning_goals: Explain at least three scientific problem-solving approaches linked to diverse functional experiences.
Generate at least two new business ideas per week using exploratory learning strategies.
Analyze the correlation between in-depth industry experience and functional diversity to apply to entrepreneurial strategies.
Achieve over 80% scientific validity and practicality for generated ideas through formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
